statement.p: At a recent Pac-12 sporting event, there were 15,600 Beavers fans and 18,200 Golden Bears fans. Write each ratio as as a reduced fraction.
A) The ratio of Beavers fans to Golden Bears fans. Preview Question 1 Part 1 of 2
B) The ratio of Beavers fans to total fans. Preview Question 1 Part 2 of 2
